channel.title: Project on S4MY9's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Project on S4MY9's Blog

item.title: [⭐] Files Events Monitor
item.description: Are you concerned about the integrity and security of your files? Do you want to keep track of any changes or activities in a specific directory? Introducing Files Events Monitor, a simple yet powerful tool to monitor file system activity and receive real-time alerts via Discord webhook. Files Events Monitor is a Python-based command-line tool designed to keep a vigilant eye on your specified directory for any file system events.

item.title: [⭐] THM Certificate Checker
item.description: If you’re a user of TryHackMe (THM), you know how valuable it is to earn certifications for your cybersecurity skills. However, verifying those certificates can sometimes be a hassle, requiring you to navigate through multiple pages or tools to ensure their validity. That’s where the THM Certificate Validator Chrome Extension comes in handy. This lightweight and user-friendly extension allows you to quickly check the validity of your THM certificates right from your browser.
